availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Private GEORGE TRULOVE (Trimble County, Kentucky, resident and private (U.S.A.))

body.p: Trimble County, Kentucky, resident and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Susan Trulove. Resident of Trimble County, Kentucky in 1850. Served in Frankfort Battalion (U.S.A.) as private from February 7, 1865 to August 9, 1865.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, District 2, p. 167. Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), p. 823. KYR-0003-101-0013.
